javadoc:
A {@link Plugin} that supplies a {@link GFileSystem filesystem} browser component
 that allows the user to view the contents of filesystems and perform actions on the
 files inside those filesystems.x

methods.name: createNewFileSystemBrowser
methods.comment:
Creates a new browser UI component for an already open GFileSystem (pinned
 with the specified FileSystemRef that will be taken ownership of by this
 method).

params.name: show
params.comment: boolean true if the new browser component should be shown

methods.javadoc:
Closes any FilesystemBrowser window component that is showing the specified filesystem.
@param fsFSRL {@link FSRLRoot} of the filesystem to close.
methods.name: removeFileSystemBrowser
methods.comment: Closes any FilesystemBrowser window component that is showing the specified filesystem.

params.name: fsFSRL
params.comment: FSRLRoot of the filesystem to close.

methods.javadoc: Close all file system browser windows.
methods.name: removeAllFileSystemBrowsers
methods.comment: Close all file system browser windows.

methods.name: doOpenFilesystem
methods.comment: Worker function for doOpenFilesystem, meant to be called in a task thread.

params.name: containerFSRL
params.comment: FSRL of the container to open

params.name: parent
params.comment: parent Component for error dialogs, null ok

methods.javadoc:
Prompts the user to pick a file system container file to open using a local
 filesystem browser and then displays that filesystem in a new fsb browser.
methods.name: openFileSystem
methods.comment:
Prompts the user to pick a file system container file to open using a local
 filesystem browser and then displays that filesystem in a new fsb browser.

methods.javadoc:
Returns true if there is a {@link ProgramManager} associated with this FSB.
@return boolean true if there is a ProgramManager.
methods.name: hasProgramManager
methods.comment: Returns true if there is a ProgramManager associated with this FSB.

return.comment: boolean true if there is a ProgramManager.

methods.name: getProviderFor

params.name: fsFSRL
params.comment: FSRLRoot of browser component to fetch.

return.comment: provider or null if not found.

name: FileSystemBrowserPlugin
comment:
A Plugin that supplies a GFileSystem browser component
 that allows the user to view the contents of filesystems and perform actions on the
 files inside those filesystems.x
